Summary Note:
Lisa Julia Bauer and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Vienna. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Lisa Julia Bauer is a 70 year old retired Partner from Austria.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced she to join.
Family Background: Lisa Julia Bauer and Schwarz have been married since 1981. Their children are named Fiona, Katharina and Lena.
Education Background:
Lisa finished secondary school at Privatgymnasium der Dominikanerinnen in 1973.
Lisa earned her degree from University of Klagenfurt in 1977.
Occupation History:
Lisa Julia Bauer is a 70 year old and comes from Austria.
Lisa Julia Bauer launched her career as a Analyst at B&C Private Equity GmbH, where she gained valuable experience from 1978 to 1981.
In 1982, she moved to Equity Partners Investment GmbH to work as a Associate, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
She spent 4 years working as a Investment Director at Equity Partners Investment GmbH, refining her expertise and building a strong network.
In 1992, she transitioned to Equity Partners Investment GmbH to take on the position of Partner, capitalizing on her expertise to propel business growth.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 1220000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She owns 3 exceptional properties: house located in Mödling, valued at approximately 1,000,000.00 EUR, house located in Eisenstadt, valued at approximately 1,261,000.00 EUR, townhouse located in Eisenstadt, valued at approximately 1,110,000.00 EUR. This impressive collection showcases her flair for luxury living and investment prowess, with a notable presence in Mödling and Eisenstadt.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Lisa as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
